parameters.name: ConsumerId
parameters.description: The name of the consumer group. If you do not configure this parameter, all consumer groups are queried.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance to which the consumer group belongs.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to be returned per page.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance to which the consumer group belongs.
